website_summaries.verdict: Enhances curls and provides texture without weighing down hair.
pros: Great for giving texture to fine hair and for defining curls for curly or wavy hair
cons: Can dry out hair a bit if used too much

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I am not a hair product snob so I typically don't spend a lot on products. I got tired of the frizz from Florida Humidity and splurged on this. My stylist uses the line and I love the smell. I have FINE thin hair and this stuff is awesome, makes is smooth and shiny with no oily residue
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Raine

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I used to buy it in the salon but I love having it delivered to my house. Works great for fine hair when you need that texture on your roots to keep your hair from looking so flat.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Dirty spray I wouldn’t call it texture
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do anything for my fine thin hair. Made hair feel really dirty even after washing. My stylist recommended this product, but I do not think it works well. It was a waste of money in my opinion. Drug store products do more for less. I’ve purchased drybar, Anika silken up and Oribe dry texture sprays brands that work. Suave and not your mothers, John freida are cheaper ones that are way better than the Paul Mitchell texture spray. OUAI wave spray works great for curl/texture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R Young

customer_reviews.title: YUCK
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! It's NOT the same stuff, it smells completely different from the stuff I usually buy from the beauty supply store in town. It even feels different. Not sure what's in the bottles I received, but it's NOT the original stuff....plus, it was not packaged to keep from leaking out all over the inside of the package... VERY DISAPPOINTED.....
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Curly hair friendly
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing on my curly fly-away hair and the smell is perfect for me. It is a heavy spicy smell that is somewhat manly. My curls are well defined without being weighed down and it doesn't leave it looking greasy or droopy as time goes on. If you can handle the scent, I highly recommend this for curly hair
customer_reviews.author: AmyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work whatsoever on my fine hair 👎
customer_reviews.text: Didnt do what I had hoped for with my fine hair! No body or volume but hair did smell much better. Can’t recommend for anyone with fine hair, waist of money!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: It's a fake!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy the same thing In salon. But salons far away so I thought I was excited to find it cheaper on Amazon. THis is not the actual product. The bottle is exactly the same, exactly. But what's In the bottle is not the same or as good as what I normally buy. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wylie

customer_reviews.title: I love this product but will track it down at Ulta ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but will track it down at Ulta or a hair salon next time. The 3rd party who ships it is not in any hurry to get it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair styling product
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair styling product. It makes your hair shiny like it has gel in it and it stays in place. But it doesn't make your hair all crispy and crusty.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B Woo

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will work
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product once, but it seems like it will do the job to tame my color treated, curly hair and hopefully control the reaction to humidity. The fragrance is a bit odd, but not unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product with my short haircut
customer_reviews.text: This makes finger-styling my shorter cut so easy. Gives great texture, but no so much that I need to shampoo it out daily. In fact, with a good brushing at night, I can use a light application the next day to refresh my style.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C

customer_reviews.title: Gives body to hair
customer_reviews.text: I spray light amount on my hair before I use my curling iron. I don’t do my whole head at once, I do it in sections spraying and curling. Gives my short thin hair a lot more body.
customer_reviews.author: NYCheryl

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I’ve used for years. I have a natural wave but it doesn’t last. This gives me the extra control and bounce I like.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: I'm In Love
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have fine hair, I love to air dry my hair and this spray gives it volume and thickness and it is perfect for summer! I totally get the authentic beachy look. This is going to be a staple product for me now!!
customer_reviews.author: Strong5

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sexy Hair!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I think its costly, its worth every penny. I just spray it on my hair after the shower when it is still damp, scrunch with my fingers and my hair looks beach sexy all day!
customer_reviews.author: bobbi j shreve

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I’ve tried so many texturizing sea sprays and this one delivers and in a decent price!!! I use it almost daily and it last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is not a strong hold. It is very good lightweight spray with a scent that that is fres with a hint of coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbicat

customer_reviews.title: Smells like the beach, gives great texture & volume
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic texture and volume. I have five hair and this is the only product that I use. It ads great texture and volume to my hair. Plus, I Love the scent. Smells like I’m on the beach. A little goes a long way, making it a great value! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Diane Masterpole

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this product, its one of the best I have found. The result I get from it are worth the money. I have thin straight hair, after towel drying I spray it on my damp hair and scrunch. I use a little hairspray amd out the door.When I use this it makes my hair wavy, it looks and feeks thicker as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lyna stark

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It gives my hair that beach look that I wanted. I blow dry my hair a bit and when its still a bit damp I'll spray this on it and let it air dry. It does give it a little crunch but it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and hope they never stop making it. I have long hair that I usually wear up. I spray this in before pulling my hair up in a bun and it makes my bun extra thick. Adds serious volume and texture.
customer_reviews.author: MizMary

customer_reviews.title: best stuff i’ve found for my thick but fine curly ...
customer_reviews.text: best stuff i’ve found for my thick but fine curly hair. only product i use, other than occasional dry shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gurr

customer_reviews.title: Great hairstyling ability!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this spray for a couple of years and it's really a great product - does not disappoint - good styling ability without the gunk-feel of other products. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: gives great body to fine hair with no buildup and really ...
customer_reviews.text: i always keep this on hand, gives great body to fine hair with no buildup and really nice smell.
customer_reviews.author: flageolet

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product-grits my hair just enough to curl and style - also gives me volume when I wear my hair straight.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Q

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t the the company that produced the product that I wanted. The quality is different. It’s ok
customer_reviews.author: Maria Leonardis

customer_reviews.title: Smells Devine!
customer_reviews.text: Smells devine. Does the job! Vendor is mostly out of stock every time I go to reorder. At least two weeks out if not more. Tried calling the manufacturer who told me they have nothing to do with THEIR Amazon listing.
customer_reviews.author: KEN R.

customer_reviews.title: ... curly hair and the texture using this product is amazing. With the Hawaiian ginger-like smell
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and the texture using this product is amazing. With the Hawaiian ginger-like smell, a fantastic product. I also use the shampoo and conditioner for perfectly silky hair. Love your products, Paul Mitchell!
customer_reviews.author: Anne G

customer_reviews.title: If I could return this for my money back, I would, but I ordered in April and just started using.
customer_reviews.text: This item is fraudulent. It is not the same formula. I have used this Sea Spray for years. This is the first time I bought from this vendor. The product has a terrible odor, like alcohol and my hair has no texture after using it. I will never buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye M.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want the beachy, carefree look...this product is for you. I have curly hair and I love the way it makes my hair look wild,sexy and yet so natural.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Shea

customer_reviews.title: Beach hair
customer_reviews.text: For the perfect beach look this is your product. And at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: J Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I have thin wavy hair and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have thin wavy hair and my hairdresser used it after cutting my hair and no styling. I ordered it on line, same price has hair salon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product ,problem-Product fluidshortage
customer_reviews.text: End product was under half bottle Gone-Empty! So disappointing! Has happened a lot lately with all my Awapuhi products! Prices were raised $ALot$ And short on product ! Not Happy
customer_reviews.author: Machelle

customer_reviews.title: Beach waves and stuff
customer_reviews.text: Well i love this stuff it puts volume in your hair for days. No really its great stuff
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product for volume. Works well on clean damp hair AND as a refresh for day old re-styljng.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair crunchier than I would like for what it costs
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hair crunchier than I would like for what it costs. I will probably try a different product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and smells good
customer_reviews.text: Trying this to keep curl in my hair and have a beach look
customer_reviews.author: Krista Starr

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like the outcome. Prefer the mousse version.
customer_reviews.text: Hair looks ok at first. But then it gets hard.
customer_reviews.author: BrazucaMama

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great hold and it does not smell like a flower bouquet on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and holds my hair in place
customer_reviews.text: Good smelling, holds my hair in place even in the Seabreeze
customer_reviews.author: An ol

customer_reviews.title: The best Sea Spray
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sea spray I have found. I have used many. I use this for styling with dryer and round brush, gives just the right amount of bite you need around the brush.
customer_reviews.author: barney108

customer_reviews.title: Love the fragarance, but...
customer_reviews.text: This works well as a salt spray, smells wonderful, but only 3 stars as it makes hair so dull, and I prefer shiny hair.
customer_reviews.author: linnie

customer_reviews.title: Best product for bringing out a natural wave in your ...
customer_reviews.text: Best product for bringing out a natural wave in your hair. Spray it on damp hair and let it air dry. Doesn't leave hair sticky or weigh hair down like the creams I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Enhances fine hair when styling
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair, and this product is a great styling aid to make my hair appear thicker and holds the style without hairspray
customer_reviews.author: Judy I.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this after I use my Redken Body Full products. Works great. Get wonderful compliments on my "beachy" look!!! Can't use too much though....hair will feel dirty....just 5 or 6 sprays.
customer_reviews.author: mortydog

customer_reviews.title: Thick hair, nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this and how thick it makes my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Makes styling hair much easier
customer_reviews.text: Can get away without blow drying at least a day or two after washing. Not as effective on the third day.
customer_reviews.author: JoyceKorn

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray! It gives you the perfect texture to create so many different looks!
customer_reviews.author: MotherofBoxers

customer_reviews.title: Love this salt spray
customer_reviews.text: Love this salt spray! Makes my hair look like I just came from the beach (in a good way) and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Adds just the right amount of texture to my soft blonde hair.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good price!
customer_reviews.text: The salon was out, and the price actually beat my salon. This is s great product for that tosseled look hair style! Scrunch and go. Smells awesome, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shilo

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective & smells bad
customer_reviews.text: This has little effect & the smell is a noxious fragrance of potpourri and aftershave. There’s a lot of other sea salt sprays that work better at a lower price point, I’d recommend one of those.
customer_reviews.author: K Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Wish it were a little easier on the budget, but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle caulfield

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchelll
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome and really makes beautiful beach waves and adds a nice shine. Perfect for the summer to make your hair look naturally tousled.
customer_reviews.author: CNDDLP

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I first tried it in a salon
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I first tried it in a salon, liked it, ordered it. It really curls your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff on my fine hair. I spray it on after blow-drying. It's not drying.
customer_reviews.author: fun times mama

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good. It really gives my hair extra curl. Smells wonderful. I am on my third bottle right now.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It makes my hair awesome curly, I can put it on, throw my hair in my bike helmet and still have it look good. It also smells fantastic and doesn't feel stiff or gross when it's in.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have super fine hair and it gives my hair some well needed texture.
customer_reviews.author: D. Root

customer_reviews.title: SCORE!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells divine !lightweight hold shiny silky hair all day long!! Keep a bottle in my work bag for light spritz pick me up at end of day before gym...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling and most effective spray I've found. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair bounce with beauty. You need to use exactly as instructed for best results. It also makes it soft. Not like spray net.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this but daily use will damage your hair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor had this and I tried some, so I already knew I liked it. When I read these reviews it confirmed I had to have some! Works great- just like it says!!
customer_reviews.author: ehollis23

customer_reviews.title: Ahh-mazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have naturally curly hair and when added to my normal style routine it really gave my curls life. It's very light and I didn't spray too much. After styling with Deva Curl styling cream I flipped my head, sprayed all over and let it air dry. Normally my curls are flat especially at the top because of the length and weight but this stuff changed that. I really enjoy the final texture and free flow of my hair after.
customer_reviews.author: SouledOut79

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Because I have naturally curly hair, this was recommended by my hairdresser to help the curls look more natural. Unlike the drugstore brands that would leave my hair "crunchy" no matter how much I used. This is light as a feather and it has a creamy, whipped consistency that can't be beat. Definitely recommend this product and I can usually find it cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Princess17

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, on time, little more than I usually pay.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how this makes my hair look! Like I've spent the day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Pichotta

customer_reviews.title: ... Mexico I was looking for something to replicate that perfect beachy hair
customer_reviews.text: After spending time this summer in the Gulf of Mexico I was looking for something to replicate that perfect beachy hair. This isn't perfect for creating waves but it works really well to add texture and is now an essential step before I create an updo. This will be a beauty staple for me.
customer_reviews.author: Springerpitt

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the awapuhi and wild ginger line from Paul mitchell. I tried this to use as a volumizer and I wasn't all that impressed. My hair is shoulder lenght, completely straight and color treated. I followed the directions and sprayed my hair then dried it using a diffuser. I didn't end up with the beachy waves I was hoping for, my hair just looked tangled and after a few hours fell flat and looked oily.
customer_reviews.author: kim5875

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Smells great and didn't make my hair stiff or sticky!
customer_reviews.author: S. Nagg

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product!
customer_reviews.text: I spray this on my hair when it is wet and it works great. My mom gave me a sample she got at her sytlist and I had to have more!
customer_reviews.author: Macy_tracy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product; not weighty but good for that loose scrunchy look
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It helps keep the curl when you scrunch up your hair. It doesn't add weight or make the hair feel wiry. But you have to only use a little and spray it from a distance. I was originally using too much and my hair got "gunky" and the salon told me to use less and spray it further away. That was good advice. And it has a wonderful fragrance. I'd use it just for the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: I've tried it now twice.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried it now twice. Once to see just how much wave could be had from my fine stick straight hair................not much. I doubt this is the products fault after all ya can't make a silk purse out of a sows ear..(there's an old one for you) Today I tried it for volume before blow drying. Just 2-3 sprays in damp hair did the trick. Doesn't feel gummy or heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniem

customer_reviews.title: FABulous
customer_reviews.text: Everyone's hair is different and reacts to products differently. My hair is relatively curly and has always been a hassle. It had only been in the last year two that I've been able to wear it curly. I'm new to this product, and love it. It adds texture in a different way from hairspray. I use Aveda Be Curly when my hair is still very wet. Once it dries a bit and has started to curl, I spray this on my hair to add a little texture and define the curls a bit. A little goes a long way, with me, anyway. So the price is justified. My curls last almost all day as well. It smells GREAT too
customer_reviews.author: ACar_CA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I use the matching shampoo and conditioner and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I use the matching shampoo and conditioner and my hair is sooo soft. and it doesn't look all dry like when I usually just scrunch it. I do also have dry natural beach wavy hair so this just tames it and makes it pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Jurewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for fine wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: Best Sea Spray I've tried, and I've tried most of them out there. It revives my wavy hair with a little spritz and either air dry or diffuser dry with blow dryer. Hair feels soft, not crunchy like many other sea sprays. My hair is fine and lacks volume. This really makes my hair look full and I love the look. I would give it 5 stars, but I think it smells kind of medicinal. (I'm a nurse, so maybe if anyone else smells it, they think it's a "work" odor.) Also, I would rather pay less, because I go through it fairly quickly...
customer_reviews.author: Sanibeljac

customer_reviews.title: great price too
customer_reviews.text: Thxs.for the availablity of this product...great price too.Dont change a thing.Will need some in at a future date.Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Robert  S. Bupp

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It leaves no residue on the hair. It perks up what little wave I have and gives extra body to my hair. Many people have asked me if I have naturally wavy hair, which I do not. Hair looks and feels natural, not plastered on as some hair spray does. It is a must for me. Sue
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING. I have curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING. I have curly hair, so it's not really great for the pull it back and air dry thing, but I will put it in a bun when I don't want to wash it again, spritz this all over and take a steamy shower - I get great volume and bounce without the frizz then.
customer_reviews.author: Skittlemeijer

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products on the market for your hair. As far as a sea spray this is the one,their is no other to compair to it. They have better shampoo and conditioner by other companies instead of Paul Mitchell but no other sea spray.I have to hide mine because everyone who comes over wants to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hebert

customer_reviews.title: not as great as I wanted it to be
customer_reviews.text: I read some great reviews so I decide to buy it. It gives you a very subtle, mild beach hair look. Compared to the Bumble/Bumble spray, I prefer BB. This, however, has a really great smell. I love the smell. It didn't do much for the look I was trying to achieve, which is more of a tousled look.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Sticky Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have straight, fine hair and this product left my hair feeling sticky.
customer_reviews.author: LiaAZD

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop using it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sea salt spray. This product may be the best texturizer I've ever used and the smell is divine. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: This is the real product and I have the best results with this compared to other brands
customer_reviews.text: This is the real product and I have the best results with this compared to other brands. Just makes my hair look awesome and really enhances the curl in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in a texturizing spray! Spray on damp hair and my fine curls stay in place, and have more volume! Does not leave my hair crunchy or look wet when my hair air dries. Have tried other brands but they do not compare.
customer_reviews.author: emme

customer_reviews.title: Great product for me!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for a few years & like how it works on my hair. Lasts a long time for curly, below shoulder length hair.
customer_reviews.author: ysck

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have NEVER been able to do any sort of beach waves in my hair before without having to use almost an entire bottle of hairspray. It works very well, even stays in the next day after sleeping on my hair. I totally recommend this product!! It smells delicious too!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherChristine

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found the spray to be very effective for my hair. It definitely doesn't mimic the look after I get out of the ocean. The best use I found for it was as a refresh on non wash days. I did like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! I use this on my very-straight hair
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! I use this on my very-straight hair; put it up in a hair clip and blow-dry for a couple of minutes or so, let it sit while I drive and when I arrive: Whalaa! Beautiful, wavy semi-curly hair without sticky residue!
customer_reviews.author: CA Mountain Sea

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for adding volume. It has a great scent, which is an added bonus. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Did what it says
customer_reviews.text: Was not too impressed. It did what it was suppose to but it left my hair extra sticky and i did not care for the smell too much. It was not a great smell. Seller packed and shipped it well but the product itself was not the best
customer_reviews.author: Kayy Emm

customer_reviews.title: Like the look
customer_reviews.text: I like the look this product gives you but wow... the feel on your hair is gross. I would not want anyone touching my hair with this on it. Don't give the look I was going for though.
customer_reviews.author: BooBooMom

customer_reviews.title: Good for Texturizing
customer_reviews.text: I use this occasionally. It has a little bit of a stronger scent than some of my other products but, overall, it works and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love they way this spray smells. I have unusually thick coarse curly hair. I try not to wash my hair too often so I need some help in between with my curls. I'll use this spray to freshen up my hair and try to restore the curl and sometimes also after a fresh wash to help control my curls. Not sure it always does exactly what I'd like it to but then again I've NEVER found a product that completely controls my wild hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but I don't think it's amazing. I don't think I'll buy it again, because I'm convinced I can find something better, but I won't be looking for something better until I finish this bottle. Make sense? The smell is good (but strong - you definitely smell the ginger). It provides a bit of texture. But it doesn't do much for combatting greasy hair (which I've used other texturizing sprays for), and doesn't provide a whole lot of texture. It's not exactly giving me beachy waves - just a bit of texture to make a bobby pin stay.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: If you have fine hair this is the best product I have ever used. It works. You get body. I will never buy anything else but this.
customer_reviews.author: Skibereen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Gives your hair volume without stickiness or ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Gives your hair volume without stickiness or stiffness. You can still style the next day without a wash inbetween.
customer_reviews.author: JoAn Miler

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Smells great and is perfect to help create soft waves in my hair without adding a lot of weight or making my hair crunchy!
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: smells great, but not the product I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This spray smells great. I have curly/wavy, thin, long hair. I was really hoping this would be the spray on, walk away, go out product I've been searching for. It's really not. It smells great, and is definitely nice & light, but I still need to use a curling iron to get the beach waves look I desire. It's okay for a day I really don't have a chance to do anything with my hair, but won't be used as a daily product.
customer_reviews.author: Lstokes

product_meta.title: Awapuhi Wild Ginger Texturizing Sea Spray, 5.1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Create a tousled, beachy hairstyle any time with Texturizing Sea Spray from Awapuhi Wild Ginger. This surf-inspired hairspray adds lush body, volume and texture to straight or wavy hair. It enhances and defines beach waves with touchable movement and contains awapuhi extract to balance moisture for a healthy-looking finish.

Hair Type: Ideal for All Hair Types.

Fragrance: Tropical ginger green tea mango scent with notes of Italian bergamot, Sicilian lemon, green tea, lily, ginger, jasmine, musk, wood and spice.

Stylist Tip: Use after curling hair with an iron to set; tousle hair with fingers to separate curls.



BRAND STORY
Awapuhi Wild Ginger is sophisticated hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products that is committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
